name: Got A Match
description:
Jumped into a short game jam. https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-55

My goal was to explore a few aspects of Unity such as:

  • Explore Fungus plug-in; some cool stuff and looking to learn ever more.
  • Explore "point and click" style mechanics, didn't even use physics here, used waypoints to create pathfinding for the clicks.
  • Explore a puzzle style game where one thing needed to be done before another (order). I have a new found respect for puzzle game creators.
  • Ramp up my artwork. I have been practicing and everything in here is all me, and I'm pretty happy with the style and outcome.

And while the game is far from complete, it's playable and my family enjoyed playing it so... tada! :)
